bike.description: C-10 Super Lite High Modulus carbon w/RIB (Re-inforced I Beam) & Integrated T-T construction, IST (Integrated Seat Tube), Integrated cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-10 Super Lite High Modulus carbon stays with shaped ride tuned chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger and CNC Disc mount only option

components.description: Rock Shox SID Team w/ PopLoc Remote & 100mm Travel
TruVativ Stylo 3.3 OCT GXP w/ Integrated BB Spindle, 22/32/44T
Avid Elixir CR Carbon Hydraulic Disc, 185/160mm rotor
Ritchey Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Ritchey WCS Stream w/ Ca-NiTi rails
